price: I još govore: "Zašto mu ne bude poslan melek?!" A da meleke pošaljemo, slučaj bi određen bio, i više se na njih ne bi čekalo.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ مَلَكٞۖ وَلَوۡ أَنزَلۡنَا مَلَكٗا لَّقُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ ثُمَّ لَا يُنظَرُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqālū lawlā unzila ʿalayhi malakun walaw anzalnā malakan laquḍiya al-amru thumma lā yunẓarūna
translations: respite would have been granted to them
